posts.post_content: This card at best is uncommon quality. Though, the fact that you can have your copy make a copy is op as hell for chump blocking in limited. That being said, I think this card is meant for limited mainly.

Posted By: Kimris (9/26/2010 11:18:31 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
From a casual perspective, this guy would be fun with [Thousand-Year Elixir](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thousand-Year Elixir) and the infinite mana Myr combo.  
  
It's undoubtedly a fragile combo, but depending on your playgroup, you might be able to pull it off. Storming your opponent with an army of a million 1/1 Myr, or using them all to make a *giant* [MYR BATTLESPHERE](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=MYR BATTLESPHERE) is the sort of thing that goes down in legend. Plus, it's an all-artifact setup, so you could play it in any color.
posts.html:
From a casual perspective, this guy would be fun with Thousand-Year Elixir and the infinite mana Myr combo.

It's undoubtedly a fragile combo, but depending on your playgroup, you might be able to pull it off. Storming your opponent with an army of a million 1/1 Myr, or using them all to make a giant MYR BATTLESPHERE is the sort of thing that goes down in legend. Plus, it's an all-artifact setup, so you could play it in any color.

posts.post_content:
Guys, this card makes tokens that are copies of itself. That means the tokens themselves can make more tokens, doubling your army's roster every turn.  
  
Just need mana for it. Easy enough with mana-producing myr and untappers like [Myr Galvanizer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Galvanizer) and [Voltaic Key](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voltaic Key).

posts.post_content:
probably the only question for this card; do the copies come into play tapped? i can't remember the rule on that ^^  
  
@ ClockworkSwordfish - thank you, i forgot about summoning sickness lol.  
   
@ Mindbend - the infinite mana combo with the myr galvanizer would untap them and give you the mana to re-tap. but you'd need to mass-haste like with akroma's memorial. tho i can't think of a type-2 card for that at the moment...  
  
still, someone will eventually ask a judge, and i'd like to know ahead of time so i can reassure the judge, who may not have seen this problem coming.  
  
and the myr battlesphere doesnt need them to have haste! i forgot. they just need to be untapped.

if you can get everyone's favorite unlimited mana combo out (galvanizer x 2 +paladium myr) and one of these and give it haste or wait a turn you can have unlimited myr propigator tokens which you can continue to blow up with forked bolts commet storms and such so your molten-tail masicore can start bombing your oponnents to death.  
  
its a good card if you play a myr deck or a deck with Drazi Monument so that u can have some tokens in case your awakening zone goes "offline" and if you run MyrDrazi you could put that in to get some early blockers and monument sackers
